page.title: 14LITTLE MARCLE LIFE STYLES 1
page.content: In this area of scanty population there is really no village centre & few public places where people meet. {Little Marcle}has a general shop & sub Post Office in converted half-timbered cottages on the old Roman road. The shop is open all hours & attracts passing trade & custom from a wide area. At{Rushall}the sub Post Office also sells a few groceries. There is a licensed working men's club which is popular for billiards & darts. The building was presented to the village & is run by a trust. Until recently part of the building was a Youth Hostel & the weathercock commemorates this.
